item.title: Blog with emacs & hugo
item.description: Sample points Issues i installing ox-hugo from melpa Dont worry about generated html, just delete the contents inside content folder and it will get auto cleared This is very important - https://ox-hugo.scripter.co/doc/org-meta-data-to-hugo-front-matter/ Check this: https://github.com/rhazdon/hugo-theme-hello-friend-ng/blob/master/exampleSite/config.toml set pygmentscodefences - https://gohugo.io/content-management/syntax-highlighting/
